name: Gas Giant Surfer
description:
v4 added bad gas pockets, change direction added and improved camera

Mobile Controls:

L = rotate left

R = rotate right

B = boost/start

<> = change direction

Keyboard Controls:

Space bar = boost/start game

left and right arrow = rotate player

up arrow = change direction

info:

collect crystals to refill boost.

game resets at end or on head crash

use boosts to get over gas pockets

WIP Test ignore
